BitField.name: CPUEVTEN
BitField.description: HW configuration of CPU(m) event output enable

BitField.name: ERRIE
BitField.description: Synchronization or trimming error interrupt enable

RegisterGroup.name: USB
RegisterGroup.description: Universal serial bus full-speed device interface

BitField.name: L1REQM
BitField.description: LPM L1 state request interrupt mask

BitField.name: ESOFM
BitField.description: Expected start of frame interrupt mask

BitField.name: PMAOVRM
BitField.description: Packet memory area over / underrun interrupt mask

BitField.name: RELOAD
BitField.description: Value to load into the SYST_CVR when the counter is enabled and when it reaches 0

BitField.name: CURRENT
BitField.description: The current value of the SysTick counter

BitField.name: NOREF
BitField.description: Indicates whether the device provides a reference clock to the processor

BitField.name: SKEW
BitField.description: Indicates whether the TENMS value is exact

BitField.name: TENMS
BitField.description: Reload value for 10ms (100Hz) timing, subject to system clock skew errors

BitField.name: INTLINESNUM
BitField.description: The total number of interrupt lines supported by an implementation, defined in groups of 32.

BitField.name: DISOOFP
BitField.description: Disables floating pointinstructions completing outof order with respect to integer instructions

BitField.name: DISFPCA
BitField.description: When set to 1, disables IT folding

BitField.name: DISFOLD
BitField.description: When set to 1, disables write buffer use during default memory map accesses

BitField.name: DISDEFWBUF
BitField.description: When set to 1, disables write buffer use during default memory map accesses

BitField.name: DISMCYCINT
BitField.description: When set to 1, disables interruption of load multiple and store multiple instructions

BitField.name: VECTPENDING
BitField.description: Indicates the exception number of the highest priority pending enabled exception

BitField.name: RETTOBASE
BitField.description: Indicates whether there are preempted active exceptions

Register.name: AIRCR
Register.description: Application Interrupt and Reset Control Register

BitField.name: SLEEPDEEP
BitField.description: Controls whether the processor uses sleep or deep sleep as its low power mode

BitField.name: SLEEPONEXIT
BitField.description: Indicates sleep-on-exit when returning from Handler mode to Thread mode

BitField.name: STKALIGN
BitField.description: Indicates stack alignment on exception entry

BitField.name: BFHFNMIGN
BitField.description: Enables handlers with priority -1 or-2 to ignore data BusFaults caused by load and store instructions

BitField.name: DIV_0_TRP
BitField.description: Enables faulting or halting when the processor executes an SDIVor UDIV instruction with a divisor of 0

BitField.name: USERSETMPEND
BitField.description: Enables unprivileged software access to the STIR

BitField.name: NONBASETHRDENA
BitField.description: Indicates how the processor enters Thread mode

Register.name: SHCSR
Register.description: System Handler Control and State Register

BitField.name: MMARVALID
BitField.description: MemManage Fault Address Register(MMFAR) valid flag

BitField.name: MLSPERR
BitField.description: Indicates a MemManage fault occurred during floating-point lazy state preservation

BitField.name: MSTKERR
BitField.description: MemManage fault on stacking for exception entry

BitField.name: MUNSTKERR
BitField.description: MemManage fault on unstacking for a return from exception

BitField.name: LSPERR
BitField.description: Indicates a bus fault occurred during floating-point lazy state preservation

BitField.name: STKERR
BitField.description: BusFault on stacking for exception entry

BitField.name: UNSTKERR
BitField.description: BusFault on unstacking for a return from exception

BitField.name: INVPC
BitField.description: Invalid PC load UsageFault, causedby an invalid PC load by EXC_RETURN

BitField.name: FORCED
BitField.description: Indicates a forced hard fault, generated by escalation of a fault with configurable priority that cannot be handled, either because of priority or because it is disabled

BitField.name: VECTTBL
BitField.description: Indicates a BusFault on a vectortable read during exception processing

BitField.name: ADDRESS
BitField.description: When the MMARVALID bit of the MMFSR is set to 1, this field holds the address of the location that generated the MemManage fault

BitField.name: ADDRESS
BitField.description: When the BFARVALID bit of the BFSR is set to1, this field holds the address of the location that generated the BusFault

BitField.name: IMPDEF
BitField.description: Implementation defined, the bits map to the AUXFAULT input signals

BitField.name: ADDRESSS
BitField.description: The location of the unpopulated floating-point register space allocated on an exception stack frame

BitField.name: IREGION
BitField.description: Number of supported MPU instruction regions

BitField.name: DREGION
BitField.description: Number of supported MPU data regions

BitField.name: SEPARATE
BitField.description: Support for unified or separate instruction and date memory maps

BitField.name: PRIVDEFENA
BitField.description: Enables privileged software access to the default memory map

BitField.name: HFNMIENA
BitField.description: Enable the operation of MPU during hard fault, NMI, and FAULTMASK handlers

BitField.name: REGION
BitField.description: Indicates the MPU region referenced by the MPU_RBAR and MPU_RASR registers

Register.name: MPU_RASR
Register.description: MPU Region Attribute and Size Register
